Rashad Osman

He was born on the 10th of October, 2001 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His parents are Abdulai and Salamatu Osman.

Career

He started his footballing career with Otapi All Stars

He had his basic education at Mbofra Turo Preparatory School, where he captained his school in their maiden Inter-School Games before continuing his studies at Mfatsipim School.

He currently studies at University of Mines and Technology (UMaT).

He is a member of the Islamic Golden Eleven. He specialises as a striker.

At his leisure time, he enjoys debates of all sorts.
